entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 03:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
